EmailTemplate.description: Customer Transition emails for customers with a Review Start Date 14 from today.
EmailTemplate.name: Customer On Deck 14 Days
EmailTemplate.subject: Attention: {!Customer_Transition__c.Account__c} - Calendar Event On-Deck
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.OwnerFullName},
Please note that Account {!Account.Name} is expiring in 30 days. Please make the necessary actions to either renew this contract or terminate.
If you have already have taken action on this, please ignore.
Thank You,
Your Support Team
